attributes.action: STOP putting a mininum wait for NHS operations (4-12 months).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: WHY should people have to wait for operations they need on the NHS? When the government sets the mininum waits that hospitals have to follow, just so that the government can make the NHS look as if it's forfilling targets set by government.  Then only to complain about how much money the economy loses through sickness in the work place!!!!!
